name: Finding Dolly
description:
Windows version is preferable. Sound on WebGL is not working as intended. 

Your sheep have broken loose and are crying out for you! You have to find them before they get them! "Who's going to kidnap the sheep?", you ask... Well you'll have to play to find out! 

WASD to Move, Mouse to Aim

Global Game Jam Project: https://globalgamejam.org/2021/games/finding-dolly-7
